sentences.sContent: All this may be the price we pay for progress.
sentences.sContent_eng: All this may be the price we pay for progress.
sentences.sCn: 这一切都可能是我们为进步付出的代价。

sentences.sContent: I'll settle with you, you have to pay for your insulting.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'll settle with you, you have to pay for your insulting.
sentences.sCn: 我早晚要找你算这笔账的，你得为你的侮辱行为付出代价。

synos.tran: 赔偿；为…而付钱；为…付出代价
